title: BRIEF-Seven West Media Signed Binding Agreement To Sell Pacific Magazines To Bauer Media
text:
BRIEF-Seven West Media Signed Binding Agreement To Sell Pacific Magazines To Bauer Media

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 12:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Seven West Media Signed Binding Agreement To Sell Pacific Magazines To Bauer Media Oct 21 (Reuters) - Seven West Media Ltd : * ANNOUNCED IT HAS SIGNED A BINDING AGREEMENT TO SELL PACIFIC MAGAZINES TO BAUER MEDIA * DEAL FOR A CASH CONSIDERATION OF $40 MILLION * SWM WILL RECEIVE $6.6 MILLION OF ADVERTISING ON BAUER MEDIA ASSETS OVER THREE YEARS * SWM AND BAUER MEDIA HAVE ALSO ENTERED INTO SOME COMMERCIAL ARRANGEMENTS TO MUTUALLY BENEFIT BOTH PARTIES

BRIEF-Seven West Media Signed Binding Agreement To Sell Pacific Magazines To Bauer Media
description: BRIEF-Seven West Media Signed Binding Agreement To Sell Pacific Magazines To Bauer Media
